website_summaries.verdict: An aesthetically pleasing lamp at an affordable price.
pros: Provides ample light, a quality shade, and a solid base
cons: A few reports of a chemical odor upon opening the lamp's packaging
On-off switch is attached to the cord, which some find inconvenient

customer_reviews.title: Be careful which one you order and receive.
customer_reviews.text: The shade is attractive, though fragile, and the base might be real wood. However, potential buyers, do note the TWO different lamps picutured. One shows a dark rod-thin lamp/socket connector between the shade and base that is in keeping with the modern mid-century style, enhancing the look. The other shows a BIG, ugly chrome socket connector (with white socket) that totally ruins the mid-century modern style and look of this lamp. Regrettably, we received one with the big, ugly chrome connector - which I will try to paint dark brown to diminish its size and industrial ugliness that turns an otherwise nice, inexpensive lamp into a jarring dollar store item.
customer_reviews.author: PenroseTribar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Phillips Hue lights!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with these lamps. The size is perfect, not too big nor too small and it looks great with Phillips Hue lights (A19 bulb)! The fabric is thick and solid enough (inside has like a thin layer of wax) that the light doesn't directly go through. Only downsides is the silver sticker on the base, but it is easily removable.
customer_reviews.author: Ben G.

customer_reviews.title: This is great for a bedside table
customer_reviews.text: This is great for a bedside table. It fits standard lightbulbs that I use around the house, but the shade diffuses the light so they aren't as harsh. It has a switch on the cord for turning the light on/off, which I prefer to the lamp styles that have the switch in the stand. (Or one of those dreaded twist ones.) And it looks great with my cozy decor. I've actually paired this with a WiFi-enabled plug so that I can schedule the light on/off and tell Google to turn it on the rest of the time. Also pictured: Diffuser - Side Table - WiFi-enabled plug -] Google Home Mini in Coral - not sold on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: GottaLoveBooks

customer_reviews.title: And the switch is a really good one, not the kind you have to roll ...
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is just right! I set it atop my bed head piece and clamped it in place (with a small C clamp). And the switch is a really good one, not the kind you have to roll with your thumb. The wood bottom is the same outer measurements as the shade. And the shade gives a nice warm glow to the over all aura. The base is a soft wood, but plenty adequate. It will take regular bulbs but not over 40 watts.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin K. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Simple Modern Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Its a simple modern desk\night stand lamp that looks fantastic with a hue lightbulb. Advertised dimensions are spot on
customer_reviews.author: Sonny Chanhvongsak

customer_reviews.title: Small, attractive lamp, versatile
customer_reviews.text: My apartment doesn’t have much natural lighting and I wanted some small, inexpensive lamps for reading and just to brighten things up. This little lamp is perfect! It doesn’t take up much space. It can sit easily on a desk, end table or nightstand and it produces an incredible amount of soft but diffuse light. The shape is very cool and lends itself to lots of decorating schemes. I am thinking of getting one or two more. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Pelican

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp! Glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about buying this because I just couldn't tell, based on the photo, if it would look tacky. But it turned out to bed a very attractive little lamp that would fit nicely in many decors. The light is gentle but I find it fine for reading (disclaimer: I do use a Kindle, though, which is backlit...so not sure if the light would be OK for someone reading a hard/soft-cover book). Placement of the on/off switch on the cord is very convenient. I like the fact that the base is solid wood. Definitely no regrets on this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Perfect desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and gives the perfect mood lighting for my desk in the evenings. The only thing I don't like is that the switch is on the power cord which makes it inconvenient to turn on depending on your set up.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Corso

customer_reviews.title: Classy little lamp
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and does not have a cheap look at all. Classy little accent lamp with a contemporary feel. I use it at the office to soften up the harsh artificial commercial lighting. Gives off a warm yellow soft light. I received many compliments. Good value for the price. This one’s a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Narinesingh

customer_reviews.title: Just what i needed for my bedroom
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this lamp for my bedroom and it is not to bright nor to dim its just the right amount of light that i needed and i am satisfied with my purchase as the lamp was priced about right . I love the way it is designed and the switch and cord length is about right.
customer_reviews.author: Matt. G

customer_reviews.title: Did not expect this quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This did not work in the location I purchased it for but I loved the lamp and couldn't bring myself to return it so I found somewhere else to use it! It is a really nice lamp - good weight and the shade seems to be a nice quality as well especially considering the price. Way nicer than I expected! I was also impressed with the packaging. Excellent purchase! Unique product for a great price... really can't believe this lamp doesn't cost more!
customer_reviews.author: Nashville066

customer_reviews.title: Love love love these little lamps.
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these lamps to put on my rolltop headboard unit, one on each side, and they're plugged into a jack that has a wall switch. I'm thrilled. They look great! It should be noted that the lampshades add quite a it of yellow tone to the light... regular Warm light bulbs were way too much yellow. I ended up getting some slightly cooler color temperature light bulbs for them.
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Certainly looks better when it's lit
customer_reviews.text: Lamp was much cheaper looking than in the picture. Certainly looks better when it's lit. Wood base is painted rather than stained and the attachment of base to shade is plastic painted shiny silver. I am in the process of changing the base to stained wood.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice lamp
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this lamp. It does not come with a bulb, however, that's not a big deal. The lamp is a good height, in my opinion, for a desk or nightstand. The base and shade are very nice. Honestly, it's an attractive lamp. I am definitely going to purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful little lamp! Great aesthetic!
customer_reviews.text: I love this style and had been looking for an affordable lamp like this for quite some time. Surpass Lighting delivered just what I was hoping for. It delivers a nice warm welcoming glow and the aesthetic is wonderful. The base does come with a little silver sticker on it that takes a minute to peel off. Annoying, but not enough to knock it down to 4 stars. Please make sure you look at the dimensions before ordering. It is tiny, but I did my homework and knew that when making the purchase. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Savory Stage

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful lamp! An excellent accent piece. Came fully assembled which was a bit surprising, I'd assumed I'd have to carefully put on the shade but it was all just encased in Styrofoam. I paired it with a RGB Dimmer LED lightbulb:(what a mouthful of a name!), and now I can set mood lighting in my bedroom. Very fun.
customer_reviews.author: Erich Blume

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design and ambiance!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these lamps for my bedroom for the purpose of lowlighting one for each nightstand. I look so forward to going to bed early just to turn them on and relax with the soft lighting and just curling up with my kindle! They look Fabulous and they work GREAT! I will definitely buy another one for the spare bedroom. It adds a beautiful "ambiance" as well as being beautifully designed.
customer_reviews.author: EW64

customer_reviews.title: Good, affordable desk lamp or bedroom lamp
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good, affordable desk or bedroom lamp. I use mine with a 9W LED dimmable warm (2700 K) bulb (equivalent to a 60W incandescent bulb). I use it on my computer desk and normally set to 25% or 50% brightness and it works very well to provide a reading and working lit environment that is easy on my eyes. I had the bulb set to 50% brightness level in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: C. Jack Swinden

customer_reviews.title: A very understated and classy looking accent lamp. I ...
customer_reviews.text: A very understated and classy looking accent lamp. I have it on a tall dresser in the corner of the room and it provides just the right amount of ambient light. I would give it 5 stars if the switch were on the base instead of two feet down the cord - very inconvenient in my case as it hangs between the dresser and the wall.
customer_reviews.author: JeffdelRey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lamp
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp for our bedroom after looking for a lamp for at least 2 months. I didn't want a lamp that would be too bright. This turned out to be perfect. I love how it has a toggle switch for an on/off. The lamp with a 40 watt bulb is perfect for what we use. I wanted something that wasn't too bright, but enough light to see with. The shade is perfect for the antique dresser that it sits on. I'm very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ccbilbo

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two to use as night lamps in the kitchen and dining room. I installed Creo LED lights controlled from my Echo Plus Gen2. The lamps are stunning, particularly at night, when they are the only lights on in their respective rooms. Great price, would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty Low light Lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Love this...lightweight and very classy looking! I have ours set on a timer to give some ambient lighting in the LR at night when we don't want too much light while watching Tv. Not for a reading lamp however, but perfect if you want just a nice splash of low light in a room
customer_reviews.author: IrishLass

customer_reviews.title: Cute but stop working after a year
customer_reviews.text: I really loved my lamps. The design is nice. They really made my room feel warm and gave it a great look. But after a year, they stop working. When ever we turn on the lamp, the lamp begins to blink like it has a short then it stops working.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect lamp for my nightstand. It adds a touch of elegance to the bedroom. I'm so pleased with this lamp!
customer_reviews.author: Nisha Nandez

customer_reviews.title: VERY HAPPY WITH THE LAMP
customer_reviews.text: I removed the label on the base [why not put it underneath the lamp?] and I wrapped the cord around the base so the on/off switch wasn't hanging behind the bookcase. The 25 watt bulb I'm using provides just the right amount of light as I don't like to have dark rooms at night. Overall I'm happy with the lamp especially considering the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Susan J. Koenker

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking light!
customer_reviews.text: Great little light, looks good as a accent light in our dining room. The bulb type is different than standard, so order a bulb too.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bedside lamps.
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these as bedside lamps. They give off more than enough light to cover the room when I need them to, but are dim enough that they do not wake you up too much should you need to turn them on at night. Like a number of other reviewers, I was confused at the choice to put the switch so far down on the cord, but I solved it by getting some command strips and sticking the switch to the back of my nightstands. I am very pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Alexei

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these and wired them to a dimmer. They look so elegant and set nice tone in the room. I do recommend using incodecent light bulbs over CFL if using a dimmer.
customer_reviews.author: R. Leon

customer_reviews.title: Mid to low quality lamp
customer_reviews.text: The lamp shade isn't very square and the interior is burnished with black marks. The base isn't as described and instead of being a wood pattern its a freckled dark plastic. It is an okay lamp, just very misleadingly described.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Harris

customer_reviews.title: Minimalist but attractive!
customer_reviews.text: Love these lamps! Recommend people using LED or CFL bulbs. They blew out our 25-watt incandescent bulbs. Replaced with LEDs and no problems now - working beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: JenInTen

customer_reviews.title: Adds a stylish, clean look to any room
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the living room and bedroom. I never could imagine something could really make a room “Pop” These really add a classy modern look which I love. My Husband who likes “Older” looking lamps, was quite impressed. He loves these. He could not believe the price was low, he was expecting these to be much more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Jeridek

customer_reviews.title: No bulb included
customer_reviews.text: I cant grade brightness because it didn’t come with a light bulb so i need to order light bulbs. Im grading brightness on lack of light bulbs. Not even sure what type of bulb to order.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Sally

customer_reviews.title: Love These ❤️💕
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent lights!! They totally change the ambiance of the room!! Provides a nice soft glow to the bedroom and just enough light so it's not blinding when I turn it on. Totally in love 😍
customer_reviews.author: MVorrath

customer_reviews.title: These lamps are nice. They're cute
customer_reviews.text: These lamps are nice. They're cute, the shade is decent. Read the limitations before you buy it. I think they give off a fairly decent light but it does cap at 40 watts (or equivalent). My biggest issue really is that the switch is on the cord rather than on the base but overall I'm pretty pleased with them. They look pretty much exactly as shown in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Most beautiful lamp I ever had
customer_reviews.text: Most beautiful lamp I ever had. First it looks small but on the nightstand it looks fabulous and it is bright enough to read with. Glad I bought this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: claudia wiedemann

customer_reviews.title: Creased
customer_reviews.text: Was creased in the box. I was able to pop out the crease but there is still a line in it now that won’t come out. Otherwise ok lamp
customer_reviews.author: Dkje4

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: We use these as our lights for the sides of our bed. It has just enough light to read and we have both lights on it fills the room without being over powering.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Vail

customer_reviews.title: The style of lamp I've been looking for, almost
customer_reviews.text: These are great contemporary lamps, they illuminate my room nicely and just look great overall. My only drawback is that the on/off switch is not on the actual lamp itself but on the wire. For someone who enjoys keeping one's space neat and tidy, having to leave a little wire exposed on my nightstand to turn them on and off gives me a twitch here and there, but nothing I can't live with.
customer_reviews.author: Brodicus89

customer_reviews.title: Very glad we purchased it.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. I just wished it projected a bit more on the warmer side, the brown shade lights up more than I would have wanted, but it is ok. They look elegant for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lamps
customer_reviews.text: We love our new bedside lamps! They provide good lighting to our room and my husband loves the retro look. This was a great purchase at an excellent price!
customer_reviews.author: katmandu

customer_reviews.title: These look good
customer_reviews.text: I like the way these look have some smart bulbs in them in my bedroom. they work great and look great. I would recommend them to family friends and to you
customer_reviews.author: G. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Minimalist Concept - Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these lamps for our nightstands in the bedroom. The design of this is based upon the minimalist concept, which I love. Simple, easy to clean, & elegantly rustic. The light that the lamps put out would not be enough to use as a reading light in bed, but it's just enough to provide a soft glow in the bedroom at night prior to going to bed. The lamps match perfectly with our rustic bedroom set.
customer_reviews.author: SJR

customer_reviews.title: Nice minimalist design - shade is too dark
customer_reviews.text: The shade is the downside. It blocks too much light. It is too dark and too opaque. That said, you end up with a very yellow hue of light.
customer_reviews.author: JNLA

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a bedside lamp with the switch in the cord...so I wouldn't need to sit up/stretch to turn it off. This has that, and is so nice looking. Adds a warmth and simplicity to the area, and enough light to read or use for general lighting in the area of the bed. Well made, comes with 2 bulbs. For any art fans, it reminds me a bit of Noguchi-style lamps, but of course much cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: ArtCat

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend purchasing this item
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend purchasing this item. The lamp must be defective as the switch gets VERY hot when it is plugged in. We discovered the switch just in time as this might have caused a fire in my home. This item is no longer eligible for return since I purchased it and had it in storage while I moved. I would definitely suggest a different product.
customer_reviews.author: A Cundiff

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I wanted a lamp for my desk. Overall the lamp looks exactly like the picture and it puts off a warm glow. I use the lamp daily and have been using it for the past two weeks. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a lamp with this design.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbybeb

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. Dark brown base if you buy from Surpass ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Dark brown base if you buy from Surpass Lighting. Base does have slightly glittery finish, but this is not noticeable unless you are very close to it. It's not sparkly at all. Love this so I bought another to have a matching set.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy switch
customer_reviews.text: Nice enough appearance but wiring assembly is untrustworthy. Cheap switch shorted and quickly gave out. If not an isolated case, probably unsafe.
customer_reviews.author: tomerson

customer_reviews.title: Voltage
customer_reviews.text: Ad misled me to think the power plug was for a 12 volt outlet. Instead it was for 110 volt. Had to change the plug for a 12 volt outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Critical Tom

customer_reviews.title: Very cool looking design
customer_reviews.text: Very cool looking design. It's a shame the power switch is located on the power cord and not the base of the lamp. Makes it kind of awkward to turn this on and off. Otherwise looks amazing and the hood still allows good light to go through.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Love this lamp- especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty & functional lamp. It's on the dresser in my son's room & he loves reading with it at night. It gives off a nice soft, warm glow & looks much more expensive than what I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Philips Hue bulb + Alexa
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a Hue bulb controlled with Alexa. A great addition to my man-cave. I love being able to control the music, TV, and now the lights from my chair. This light, at less than 6 inches wide, fits perfectly on a ledge/shelf and with Philips Hue/Amazon Dot, Alexa can control the amount of light and turn them on or off. Life is good!
customer_reviews.author: JD in Rochester

customer_reviews.title: Very good lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I wish that I bought this earlier! It gives off a soft yellow glow and it really makes the space warm and inviting.
customer_reviews.author: BBRITT

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lamp
customer_reviews.text: My lamp was a nice addition to my room with it's modern look. the design looks excellent with my modern design furniture i made, and the color pairs nicely with the overall rustic theme. If you're not over handling this and keep it clean it should last you a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Dr McYoloSwag

customer_reviews.title: Nice bright
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised by the quality of this lamp, i expected it to be a little janky cuz of the price . . . But nope it's kool.
customer_reviews.author: DANIEL MEDINA

customer_reviews.title: Nice, simple lamp
customer_reviews.text: A nice, simple lamp. I bought two for either side of the bed. Came assembled; the shade attached to base. Just needed to screw in a bulb and plug it in. Mine are attached to a wall-switch controlled outlet, so I'm not using the on-cord power switch.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: READ BEFORE
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, modern styled lamp. Looks great in my room against my tan wall. I love the light it puts out to the top and bottom. The design makes for a lit room, without the "blinding effect" at night. Only thing I DO NOT like about it is the on and off switch being on the chord
customer_reviews.author: BryanB

customer_reviews.title: Looks good. And works perfect
customer_reviews.text: Alittle cheap feeling. But overall for 20$ what can you ask for. Looks good. And works perfect. Also had a switch on the cord to turn off or on which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect for desk or end table or nightstand
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love them perfect size for end table or desk. And it looks very expensive the shades are high quality
customer_reviews.author: jill miller

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but is delicate.
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine for a dim relaxed night light effect. The bulb sits kind of low in the lamp, instead of the center. But I just bought an extender. It's good for the value.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp. Its perfect for my bedside table. The light it gives off is very soft and not too bright. The only thing I would change is that the on/off switch is on the cord. I liked that it came assembled, you just had to put the light bulb in.
customer_reviews.author: Doxiemama

customer_reviews.title: Best lamp I've purchase for this price!
customer_reviews.text: I needed light for my living room that has no ceiling lights and these are perfect for warm lighting. Wonderful size and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Elitag

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in my home office
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this lamp for my home office. It is the perfect size and style for my computer desk. It is very well made and an exceptional value for the price. I looked for over a week in local stores and other online retailers before purchasing this lamp. I am very happy with this product. I intend to browse the other items offered by this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Love the look!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I love the way the light is filtered through the lampshade, works great on my night stand thats hooked up to a smart switch. Alexa Helps me a ton throughout the day!
customer_reviews.author: Timmy G

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: great product. I have three of these in my bedroom to help give it some light
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our front door entry way
customer_reviews.text: We needed a small lamp with a linen-look rectangular shade. This worked perfectly. The glow is soft and warm.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: This pairs well with the Yeahbeer LED Flame Effect Light ...
customer_reviews.text: This pairs well with the Yeahbeer LED Flame Effect Light Bulb, E26 Flickering Flame Light Bulb to imitate a candle lamp. While together they don't shed much light in a room, they add a calming/ romantic mood.
customer_reviews.author: Shiroh niichan

customer_reviews.title: decent lamp
customer_reviews.text: decent lamp. the shade blocks a little more light then i expected making it a warmer looking room then bright. happy with its build quality.
customer_reviews.author: PMI

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Its price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little lamp! Its not too bright, its long lasting, it doesn't release a noticeable amount of heat, comfortable lighting, and cheap! I didn't need a converter or anything for it, just plugged it in and it worked great! Its not too big so it's perfect for a desk or night table. Not too bright either, and it sets a very comfy mood!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon M.

customer_reviews.title: Good value and nice looking!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two lamps which were delivered promptly and in good condition. The on/off switch is on the cord. They are on a dresser in my bedroom; I used soft light 25 watt incandescent bulbs and the effect is warm and restful. They are perfect for what I wanted; a simple, modern yet calming effect. Very happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: James P. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Mood lamps
customer_reviews.text: These not designed for reading but a nice shape to make a modern and tasteful glow where you need it. Two look good together on a ntable
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Great little lamp for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great little lamp and the perfect nightstand size. Only complaint (totally nitpicking) would be the switch on the wire is quite a ways down the wire, which makes it a pain to reach at times. I've put a smart bulb in it so I can control it with my phone...lazy but problem solved!
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: repurchase
customer_reviews.text: this was my 2nd purchase of this lamp...low profile and stylish...
customer_reviews.author: Аmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I don;t recommend this
customer_reviews.text: It's a really cheap lamp. the quality is not good. you can see the glue on the edges, and it pretty smelly.
customer_reviews.author: vivian wei

customer_reviews.title: Worth getting another one!!!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp was the exact size I was looking for and provides the right amount of light as informed before ordering. Probably going to get another one.
customer_reviews.author: Judson B.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what is pictured.
customer_reviews.text: I received the lamp in the time frame specified and it is exactly what is pictured. I had to use the dimmist light bulb I had because my normal lightbulbs are pretty bright in this lamp. A much dimmer light is what I like to give off the nice subtle effect I was going for when I bought the lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works with Philips Hue
customer_reviews.text: Unobtrusive and classy. Put Philips hue lights in these and have them on a schedule to provide mood lighting around my house.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney H. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I liked it so much, I circled back around a few months later and bought another one. Great product, ships fast.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Nice soft light for a room that should be dark ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice soft light for a room that should be dark anyway. Not a light to read by, but one to get ready for bed by.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful. Sometimes you have a little space that requires something exact. This lamp did it for me. I added a dimmer to it and only use a 15w bulb (my eyes are extremely sensitive). It's a calming, streamlined well- made lamp. Goes on my kitchen counter in the corner when I don't want the brightness of the overhead lights.
customer_reviews.author: DiscerningShopper

customer_reviews.title: Stylish lamp of good quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little lamp. Sturdier than expected. Shade is actual cloth and the base real wood. Attached it to a dimmer so it makes even nicer (dimmer not included with lamp--I purchased that separately). If you want something cheap, go to Chinatown--but it'll fall apart on you. This one will last you a while.
customer_reviews.author: bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased, I see this quality in high end modernist ...
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased, I see this quality in high end modernist shops at about $200 each. Replaced two old vintage lamps that just swallowed the room. Really like these.I Suggest using WARM white LED bulbs. Also they were delivered in two days to my Amazon Locker.
customer_reviews.author: JlDon

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful lamp
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful lamp that arrived in prefect condition and is exactly what I was hoping for. It's the perfect addition to the night stand, I may have to order a couple more for the other side of the bed and the guest room.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Simple and good looking. With a 40W (or equivalent) bulb, it casts a nice, soft glow. A bit small; check the dimensions to see if it would be right for you.
customer_reviews.author: Napa Jack

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Lamps arrived with black stains in them that won't come out. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Richard martin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent packaging to prevent any damage during shipment
customer_reviews.text: Very timely delivery. Excellent packaging to prevent any damage during shipment. Excellent product. Met expectations as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Louis M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are nice looking little lamps. I got 2 and am very happy with both
customer_reviews.author: StraightUpReviewsTop Contributor: Hydroponics

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the picture. I put in a 25W CFL bulbs, gives just enough light around the lamp, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan W.

customer_reviews.title: Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I certainly like the product, however this question has been answered already.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Burke

customer_reviews.title: mid-century modern
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp, classic mid-century modern appearance, great night light
customer_reviews.author: Froggy

customer_reviews.title: Love mine
customer_reviews.text: I loved my first Lamp so much I bought a second one. I use an LED bulb and I have mine plugged into a smart plug so that I can turn them on and off on a timer or manually from anywhere with my smartphone.
customer_reviews.author: RBoz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful accent lamps do wonders for our spare room - ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful accent lamps do wonders for our spare room - they look great and are functional. Love the way the switch works so smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Not as small as I expected but has great lighting
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Max 40 watt bulb
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific lamp on my bookshelf. 40 watt maximum bulb. The shade is fabric and the materials are high quality. The switch is on the cord. The look is modern and sleek.
customer_reviews.author: M. Heiss

customer_reviews.title: I love these lamps
customer_reviews.text: I love these lamps. My girlfriend kinda hates how much I love these lamps. She kinda hates how much I love lamps in general. She be like "turn that lamp off". And I be like "no". I love these lamps.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Tate

customer_reviews.title: Good small lamps for my night stand
customer_reviews.text: They are definitely smaller than I imagined they'd be, but they're decent lamps. The only drawback these have is that the switch is the that is on the cord, so you have to position it for easy access unless you put it on an outlet with a switch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Modern lamp
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive, have a TP-Link Smart Bulb in it and seems to work well, have had for several months now
customer_reviews.author: Adam M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect night lamp
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp. Perfect for a bedroom where you don't want brightness but also not be in total darkness. Nice to fall asleep too.
customer_reviews.author: Ervin

customer_reviews.title: Great low level lighting
customer_reviews.text: Nice lamp for the price. I like that its low level lighting. The shade provides a nice warmth to the lighting. If hi intensity light bothers you, this is the light for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic little desk lamp. Really love the look of it and it gives a very high quality feel without a large price tag. Placed a Philips Hue bulb in it and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: David Van Wart

product_meta.title: Surpars House Minimalist Solid Wood Table Lamp Bedside Desk Lamp
feature_bullets: E26 bulb base but bulb not included
There is an on/off switch in the middle of the cord,standard American plug
Recommend putting it in bedroom or living room,it will bring you a peaceful and warm night.
